entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Twillingate
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Twillingate 09:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: W 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening then northeast 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late in the morning and in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
